mapper.select: SELECT b.uuid as personalInfoFileUuid, b.ext as personalInfoFileExt, b.orig_name as personalInfoFileOrigName, b.year as personalInfoFileYear, b.month as personalInfoFileMonth, b.day as personalInfoFileDay FROM student a LEFT JOIN files b ON a.passport_file_idx = b.idx WHERE a.student_id = #{studentId} AND a.idx = #{studentIdx}
